pr_title: Response Server: Integration with OAuth Scim Service for Token Introspection

timeline.bodyText:

Missing a Javadoc comment.
timeline.author: github-actions

timeline.bodyText:
what are these URI's from? and why are they being set here?
A few other areas of concern:

URL should not be hardcoded here within the code
they should follow the rest patterns, e.g. POST .../participants to create one, instead of .../participant/add
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText:
Created an Issue #860 to change the endpoint. This review comment will be addressed in follow-up PR.
URIs configured in this filter matches with RequestMapping's in Controller classes. This is same approach followed in other services for  token introspection.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

timeline.bodyText: maybe move http://localhost:8004 to a variable to make future edits easier
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText:
Initially, we used TestRestTemplate for writing integration tests, so we added complete URL in ApiEndpoint.  After few PR's Nik suggested us to use MockMVC  which requires only the path, so added a method to extract the Path from URL : URL(url).getPath()
I agree with your comment, but we've followed the same pattern in all the services for integration tests.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc
